H0.text: What is the name of the estuary north of Bordeaux in SW France, formed by the confluence of the Garonne and Dordogne rivers . Garonnelle

H1.text: What is the name of the estuary north of Bordeaux in SW France, formed by the confluence of the Garonne and Dordogne rivers . Dordognelle

H2.text: What is the name of the estuary north of Bordeaux in SW France, formed by the confluence of the Garonne and Dordogne rivers . Bordeaux Estuary

H3.text: What is the name of the estuary north of Bordeaux in SW France, formed by the confluence of the Garonne and Dordogne rivers . GIRONDE

A4.text: The Gironde estuary is formed from the meeting of the rivers Dordogne and Garonne just downstream of the centre of Bordeaux.
